title: The many benefits of  taking a healing holiday
description: ‘Helaing holidays’ are on the rise to help maximise your health and happines. It is an opportunity to take some time out from your day to day life to reset and more importantly learn how to adjust your lifestyle so that you can maintain the state when you return.

title: The best Kyoto restaurant to try Japanese food
description: From tofu to teahouses, here’s our guide to Kyoto’s best restaurants to visit

title: Skip Chichen Itza and head to this remote Yucatan
description: It’s remote and challenging to get,but braving the jungle and explorin these ruins without the crowds is totally worth the effort. Here are our tips and tricks on how to explore this lesser-visited and amazing example of Mayan architecture.

title: Surf’s up at these beginner spots around the world
description: If learning to surf has in on your to- do list for a while, the good news is: it’s never too late. Mind surfing fighting for the peak bottom turn, Simpo reef break aquarium making the bottom turn, dawn patrol tuck. Shaka ending maneuver float rail grab reef rash muscle.
